isOpen.title: Is open
isOpen.description:
A value indicating whether the group is currently expanded and showing
its children.

isLoading.title: Is loading
isLoading.description:
A value indicating whether the group is currently loading.  This property
is observable.

description:
A group of data items and other groups in the {@link Catalog}.  A group can contain
{@link CatalogMember|CatalogMembers} or other
{@link CatalogGroup|CatalogGroups}.
title: Group
